Description: This web service allows searching for appointments and returns up-to-date appointment information. It includes appointments scheduled in Epic, but it does not include external appointments or appointment requests.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

Appointment.Name: Appointment
Appointment.Description: An instance of the STU3 Appointment resource.

Appointment.status OrderStatus.Name: extension
Appointment.status OrderStatus.Description: The order status for the order associated with the appointment. This extension is returned only for organizations in the Netherlands.

created.Name: created
created.Description: The date when the appointment was created.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/eAfspraak-Appointment

minutesDuration.Name: minutesDuration
minutesDuration.Description: The estimated length of the appointment.

participant.Name: participant
participant.Description: Patient, providers, and locations associated with the appointment.
